testimonial1.text: Sghaier Bacem helped me a lot with my move. The distance wasn't much but there were many things. With speed and precision everything was done according to my requests, at a very interesting price.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: SGH Trasporti is a company based in the province of Parma, specialized in road freight transport. Founded and managed by Sghaier Bacem, the company offers transport services both nationally and internationally.
about.story1: SGH Trasporti is a company based in the province of Parma, specialized in road freight transport. Founded and managed by Sghaier Bacem, the company offers transport services both nationally and internationally, thanks to the availability of various means of transport and the expertise of its staff.
about.story2: Globalization has brought markets closer together and the ability to shop online has increased the demand for reliable and professional transport services.
about.story3: SGH Trasporti stands out for courtesy, availability and customer satisfaction, offering a highly professional, dynamic and efficient service, with competitive prices that guarantee excellent value for money.
about.reliabilityDesc: Punctual deliveries and guaranteed service quality
